name: Northern Smoked Chicken
description:
During this Round, the target character's next Normal Attack costs 1 less Unaligned Element.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
descriptionraw: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less $[K309].\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
descriptionreplaced: During this Round, the target character's next <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attack</color> costs 1 less <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>.\n(A character can consume at most 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3101}Food per Round)
storytext: This dish makes for a warm welcome for guests who come to the northern regions. Now, what manner of guests shall be "treated" to this hospitality this time?
